marge.middleware.publisher.models

Class TikitagPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • marge.middleware.publisher.specification.AbstractPublisher
      • marge.middleware.publisher.models.TikitagPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPublisher

    public class TikitagPublisher
extends AbstractPublisher
implements IPublisher
    TagServiceConfiguration will read the configuration of tikitag readers and save them into table with key is ClientId ClientId is the ip address of device that connects to tikitag reader
    TagService will use TagServiceConfiguration to manage the configuration of all reader and tag reader
    Because the tikitag reader and tikitag tag are passive, so to know they are connected or changed their configuration,
    The good way is to send a polling command to query their status
    In a certain time, TagService will do 2 jobs:
    1. Send polling command to detect reader and tag's data by calling Acr122TagReader and MifareTag
    2. Set threshold value for generating the events
    The device's data is managed by ReaderManager and the events are managed by ReaderManager
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

      TikitagPublisher()
